item.description:
Event: Join us for an after-dark, fun-filled adventure through acres of corn mazes! Grab your map and some comfortable shoes, because you'll need them! It's a scavenger hunt like no other....
Trip Coordinator: Stephanie cedimeister@yahoo.com
Location: Marini Farm, 259 Linebrook Road, Ipswich (http://marinifarm.com....
Meet @ 5:20 PM at the Ipswich train station OR @ 5:45 pm at Marini Farm, 259 Linebrook Road, Ipswich (I'll be standing in front of the booth to purchase maze tickets (near the corn field), holding a bunch of lite up sticks)
RSVP: Needed. email Stephanie at the link listed above by Friday, October 22nd. Please include a phone number for contact on the day of the event
Cost: $10.00 per person (group discounts available for groups of 20+ people) plus $5 nonpaid member or Mosaic guest.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Stephanie standing in front of the booth to purchase maze tickets (near the corn field), holding a bunch of lite up sticks

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Maze Craze!
